ChapterShortDescription: Developer Student Club Kabarak University  university based community groups for students interested in Google developer technologies. Students from all undergraduate or graduate programs with an interest in growing as a developer are welcome. By joining us, you'll grow your knowledge in a peer-to-peer learning environment and build solutions for local businesses and their community.
ChapterLongDec: The motive of our community is to create a local ecosystem of programmers & hackers in and around the campus. Students from all undergraduate or graduate programs with an interest in growing as a developer are welcome
aboutGDGProgram: DSC Kabarak, helping students bridge the gap between theory and practice
